long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This world wide phenomenon of a game was one that had everyone hooked from the day it was released. As an adventurer, your task is to run as fast as you can and collect as many coins as possible while evading monsters that are hot on your heels. As you progress and gain more points, you can unlock new runners. Your adventurers goal is to find the hidden treasure and escape from the tomb but the guardians won’t let him. You’ll get addicted as you slide under tiny spaces, make high jumps over broken bridges and make sharp turns as you continue in your endless run. As you progress with each level, so will your speed increase and the stakes get deadlier. You can use your coins to purchase new characters and equipment to aid you on your quest!
